panels.description:
Total listeners added (either via static config or LDS).
Total listeners modified (via LDS).
Total listeners removed (via LDS).
Total listeners stopped.
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/listeners/stats

panels.description:
Total connections rejected due to configured overload actions

panels.description:
Total connections that didn’t match any filter chain

panels.title: Connections no filter chain

panels.description:
Total connections rejected due to enforcement of global connection limit
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/listeners/stats
panels.title: Connections rejected by global limit

panels.description:
Sockets currently undergoing listener filter processing
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/listeners/stats

panels.description:
Sockets that timed out during listener filter processing

panels.description:
Number of enforced consecutive  gateway failure ejections

panels.description:
Total connections closed via HTTP/1.1 connection close header or HTTP/2 or HTTP/3 GOAWAY
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/upstream/cluster_manager/cluster_stats
panels.title: Connection closed

panels.description:
Total consecutive connection failures exceeding configured connection attempts
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/upstream/cluster_manager/cluster_stats
panels.title: Connection consecutive failures

panels.description:
Total times connection not established due to no healthy hosts
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/upstream/cluster_manager/cluster_stats
panels.title: Connection not established no healthy hosts

panels.description:
Total requests that timed out waiting for a response

panels.title: Request timeouts

panels.description:
Total requests cancelled before obtaining a connection pool connection

panels.title: Request cancelled

panels.description:
Total requests closed due to max duration reached
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/upstream/cluster_manager/cluster_stats
panels.title: Request closed max duration reached

panels.description:
Total requests pending a connection pool connection
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/upstream/cluster_manager/cluster_stats
panels.title: Request pending

panels.description:
Total requests that were failed due to a connection pool connection failure or remote connection termination
https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/upstream/cluster_manager/cluster_stats
panels.title: Request pending failure eject

panels.description:
Total requests that overflowed connection pool or requests (mainly for HTTP/2 and above) circuit breaking and were failed

panels.title: Request pending overwflow
